welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schertz, a charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore our vibrant downtown, try our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in all the beauty Schertz has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Antonio International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, gift shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or chartered aircraft, the private terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
